channel.title: Can any1 make a runner for this java?
channel.description:
Can any1 make a runner for this java??? i got problem with doenloading jdk1.6.0_03 i get error with installation always But i got the next versions of java: jdk1.5.0_12 (I use for compling) jre1.6.0.03
if any1 can make a server runner for this java because when i use: [code]@echo off color 0a title Server java -Xmx1024m -splash:splash.jpg -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server 4545 pause[/code] i get: [code] java wordt niet herkend als een interne of externe opdracht, programma of batchbestand. Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . . [/code] when download jdk 1.6.0_03 i getting error with installing and because of that when i click on run with a unfiniched java i getting a error because a few progams not there...
can any1 make a server runner for the version of java i got or go to c:/progam files in java map and upload jdk1.6.0_03 if you got not jre !!
long topic, huh? hope i have time to help me
ragean

item.title: Can any1 make a runner for this java?
item.dc:creator: @Ragean Ragean
item.description:
@Ragean wrote:

Can any1 make a runner for this java???
i got problem with doenloading jdk1.6.0_03 i get error with installation always But i got the next versions of java:
jdk1.5.0_12 (I use for compling)
jre1.6.0.03

if any1 can make a server runner for this java because when i use:

@echo off color 0a title Server java -Xmx1024m -splash:splash.jpg -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server 4545 pause
i get:

java wordt niet herkend als een interne
of externe opdracht, programma of batchbestand.
Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .

when download jdk 1.6.0_03 i getting error with installing and because of that when i click on run with a unfiniched java i getting a error because a few progams not thereâ€¦

can any1 make a server runner for the version of java i got or go to c:/progam files in java map and upload jdk1.6.0_03 if you got not jre !!

long topic, huh? hope i have time to help me

ragean
